SEARCH
Package service

Interface IApplyableService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantService, HdbOfficerService
public interface IApplyableService
Defines application-related operations for users who can apply for projects and submit enquiries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    applyForProject(User user, Project project)
    Applies for a project.

    Calculates the age of a user based on their date of birth.

    Deletes an existing enquiry.

  • Method Details

    • calculateAge

      int calculateAge(Date birthDate)
      Calculates the age of a user based on their date of birth.
      Parameters:
      birthDate - The user's date of birth.
      Returns:
      The age in years.

    • applyForProject

      boolean applyForProject(User user, Project project)
      Applies for a project.
      Parameters:
      user - The User applying.
      project - The Project being applied for.
      Returns:
      true if the application was successful, false otherwise.

    • getApplicationStatus

      Application getApplicationStatus(User user)
      Retrieves the current application status for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User.
      Returns:
      The current Application object, or null if none found.

    • submitEnquiry

      Enquiry submitEnquiry(User user, Project project, String message)
      Submits a new enquiry for a project.
      Parameters:
      user - The User submitting the enquiry.
      project - The Project the enquiry is about.
      message - The enquiry message.
      Returns:
      The created Enquiry object.

    • viewEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> viewEnquiries(User user)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User.
      Returns:
      A List of Enquiry objects.

    • viewEnquiryById

      Enquiry viewEnquiryById(String enquiryId, User user)
      Retrieves a specific enquiry by ID, ensuring it's accessible to the user.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry.
      user - The User requesting the view.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object or null if not found/not authorized.

    • editEnquiry

      void editEnquiry(String enquiryId, User user, String newMessage)
      Edits an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to edit.
      user - The User attempting to edit.
      newMessage - The new message.

    • deleteEnquiry

      void deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId, User user)
      Deletes an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete.
      user - The User attempting to delete.
